mapper.select: select MEU.MENU_ID as id, MEU.MENU_NAME as name, MEU.MENU_ICON as icon, MEU.PARENTID as parentid, NVL(MEN.MENU_NAME,'-') as parentname from MENU MEU left join MENU MEN on MEU.PARENTID=MEN.MENU_ID where MEU.PARENTID=#{id} and MEU.ISUSED=1 order by MEU.MENU_INDEX

select MEUSS.MENU_ID as id, MEUSS.MENU_NAME as name, MEUSS.PARENTID as parentid, MEUSS.MENU_ICON as icon, NVL(MEN.MENU_NAME,'-') as parentname from MENU MEUSS left join MENU MEN on MEUSS.PARENTID=MEN.MENU_ID where MEUSS.PARENTID=#{id} and MEUSS.ISUSED=1 order by MEUSS.MENU_INDEX

SELECT MEU.MENU_PATH as path, MEU.MENU_ICON as icon, MEU.MENU_CODE as code, MEU.MENU_NOCACHE as no_cache, MEU.MENU_ID as id, MEU.MENU_NAME as name, MEU.MENU_URL as url, MEU.PARENTID as parentid, #{userId} as userId from MENU MEU left join ROLEMENURELATION ROLT on MEU.MENU_ID = ROLT.MENUID left join ROLE ROL on ROLT.ROLEID = ROL.ROL_ID where ROL.ROL_ID in ( select RL.ROL_ID from USER_INFO USI left join USERROLERELATION URRL on USI.ID = URRL.USERID left join ROLE RL on URRL.ROLEID = RL.ROL_ID where USI.ID = #{userId} ) and MEU.PARENTID='0' AND MEU.ISUSED='1' GROUP BY MEU.MENU_PATH, MEU.MENU_ICON, MEU.MENU_CODE, MEU.MENU_ID, MEU.MENU_NAME, MEU.MENU_NOCACHE, MEU.MENU_URL, MEU.PARENTID, MEU.MENU_INDEX ORDER BY MEU.MENU_INDEX

SELECT MEU.MENU_PATH as path, MEU.MENU_ICON as icon, MEU.MENU_CODE as code, MEU.MENU_NOCACHE as no_cache, MEU.MENU_ID as id, MEU.MENU_NAME as name, MEU.MENU_URL as url, MEU.PARENTID as parentid, #{userId} as userId from MENU MEU left join ROLEMENURELATION ROLT on MEU.MENU_ID = ROLT.MENUID left join ROLE ROL on ROLT.ROLEID = ROL.ROL_ID where ROL.ROL_ID in ( select RL.ROL_ID from USER_INFO USI left join USERROLERELATION URRL on USI.ID = URRL.USERID left join ROLE RL on URRL.ROLEID = RL.ROL_ID where USI.ID = #{userId} ) and MEU.PARENTID=#{id} AND MEU.ISUSED='1' GROUP BY MEU.MENU_PATH, MEU.MENU_ICON, MEU.MENU_CODE, MEU.MENU_ID, MEU.MENU_NAME, MEU.MENU_NOCACHE, MEU.MENU_URL, MEU.PARENTID, MEU.MENU_INDEX ORDER BY MEU.MENU_INDEX
select distinct MEU.MENU_ID as id, MEU.MENU_NAME as name from ROLEMENURELATION ROLT left join MENU MEU on ROLT.MENUID = MEU.MENU_ID where ROLT.ROLEID = #{roleid} and MEU.MENU_ID is not null

select MEU.MENU_ID as id, MEU.MENU_CODE as code, MEU.MENU_NAME as name, MEU.MENU_URL as url, MEU.ISUSED as isused, MEU.PARENTID as parentid, MEU.MENU_INDEX as indexs, MEU.MENU_ICON as icon, MEU.CREATORID as creatorid, MEU.CREATETIME as createtime, MEU.MODIFIERID as modifierid, MEU.MODIFYTIME as modifytime, MEU.MENU_PATH as path, MEU.COMPONENT as component, MEU.MENU_NOCACHE as no_cache, MEU.TREEABOUT as treeabout from MENU MEU WHERE MEU.PARENTID='0' ORDER BY MEU.MENU_INDEX

select MEU.MENU_ID as id, MEU.MENU_CODE as code, MEU.MENU_NAME as name, MEU.MENU_URL as url, MEU.ISUSED as isused, MEU.PARENTID as parentid, MEU.MENU_INDEX as indexs, MEU.MENU_ICON as icon, MEU.CREATORID as creatorid, MEU.CREATETIME as createtime, MEU.MODIFIERID as modifierid, MEU.MODIFYTIME as modifytime, MEU.MENU_PATH as path, MEU.COMPONENT as component, MEU.MENU_NOCACHE as no_cache, MEU.TREEABOUT as treeabout from MENU MEU WHERE MEU.PARENTID=#{ID} ORDER BY MEU.MENU_INDEX

select MEU.MENU_URL as url, MEU.MENU_ID as id, MEU.MENU_CODE as code, MEU.MENU_NAME as name, MEU.ISUSED as isused, MEU.PARENTID as parentid, MEU.MENU_ICON as icon, MEU.CREATETIME as createtime, MEU.MODIFYTIME as modifytime, MEN.MENU_NAME as parentname, MEU.MENU_NOCACHE as no_cache, MEU.MENU_PATH as path, MEU.COMPONENT as component, usi.NAME as creator , usf.NAME as modifier from MENU MEU left join MENU MEN on MEU.PARENTID=MEN.MENU_ID left join USER_INFO usi on MEU.creatorid=usi.id left join USER_INFO usf on MEU.MODIFIERID=usf.ID WHERE MEU.MENU_ID =#{ID}
mapper.update: update MENU MEU set MEU.MENU_NAME=#{name}, MEU.PARENTID=#{parentid}, MEU.MENU_PATH=#{path}, MEU.MENU_ICON=#{icon}, MEU.MENU_URL=#{url}, MEU.ISUSED=#{isused}, MEU.MENU_NOCACHE=#{noCache}, MEU.MODIFYTIME=(SELECT sysdate FROM DUAL), MEU.MODIFIERID=#{modifierid} where MEU.MENU_ID=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into MENU ( MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, PARENTID, MENU_PATH, MENU_ICON, MENU_URL, ISUSED , MENU_NOCACHE, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME, MENU_CODE, CREATORID, MODIFIERID, COMPONENT, MENU_INDEX ) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{parentid}, #{path}, #{icon}, #{url}, #{isused}, #{noCache}, (SELECT sysdate FROM DUAL), (SELECT sysdate FROM DUAL), #{code}, #{creatorid}, #{modifierid}, #{component}, #{index} )
